Knowing <WG1492> That <WG3754> He Who <WG3588> Raised Up <WG1453> The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> Jesus, <WG2424> Also <WG2532> Us <WG2248> Through <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Will Raise Up, <WG1453> And <WG2532> Will Present <WG3936> With <WG4862> You. <WG5213>
